publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2234 Nigel Don: Banff Academy - Young Engineers Club of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Banff Academy on its award of Young Engineers Club of the Year at the Scottish Council for Development and Industry (SCDI)’s Celebration of Engineering; notes the club members’ hard work throughout the year and club co-ordinator David Pirie’s dedication and enthusiasm, and acknowledges the contribution of teachers and Scottish companies that have contributed to the success of SCDI’s network of 260 young engineers clubs that saw a record 600 young engineers, teachers and companies attending this year’s celebration.

S3M-2234 Banff Academy - Young Engineers Club of the Year (lodged on 20 June 2008) Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*, Aileen Campbell*, Robin Harper*
S3M-2234 Banff Academy - Young Engineers Club of the Year (lodged on 20 June 2008) John Park*, Jamie Hepburn*, Nanette Milne*, Hugh Henry*, Willie Coffey*
S3M-2234 Banff Academy - Young Engineers Club of the Year (lodged on 20 June 2008) Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*
